entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor CSS Isolation Issue only on certain pages #44267
  • [Analyzer] Verify no two or more pages are using the same @page path #44266
  • [release/8.0] Update Roslyn Versions for Runtime Compilation Package #44265
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM Redirection after Authenticating #44264
  • Blazor Wasm ( Hosted )Template project issue with Authentication #44262
  • kestrel web api causes its client app failure of An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host #44261
  • Docs: Minimal APIs - Middleware + perf + configs #44259
    7.0.0
  • Docs - Minimal APIs - Dealing with responses #44258
    7.0.0
  • Docs - Minimal API - Document your APIs #44257
    7.0.0
  • Docs - Minimal API Basics #44256
    7.0.0
  • Typo in Title of ControllerBase.Problem() #44254
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove magic string for razor component @page routing #44253
  • [Analyzer] Verify Blazor route type constraints are specified with all lower-case letters #44252
    Backlog
  • Format arguments for IStringLocalizer do not support nullable reference types #44251
    Backlog
  • Best practice to use IResult in a class library #44250
  • Problem with slow loading of static files such as js in .NET 6.0.8 and IIS 10 web application #44255
  • [RequestHeaderTests] Unit tests always succeed #44249
    Test failures
  • Blazor Wasm authentication with identity provider behind reverse proxy using http #44248
    Discussions
  • [Analyzer] WebHost usage analyzer #44245
  • [Analyzer] Detect middleware in pipeline after terminal middleware #44244
  • [Analyzer] Detect adding middleware services but middleware isn't used #44243
  • Error","messageTemplate":"HTTP/2 over TLS was not negotiated on an HTTP/2-only endpoint. #44241
  • SecurityTokenInvalidAudienceException: IDX10206: Unable to validate audience. The 'audiences' parameter is empty. Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.Validators.ValidateAudience(IEnumerable<string> audiences, SecurityToken securityToken, TokenValidationParameters validationParameters) #44240
  • [Analyzer] SocketTransportOptions.MaxReadBufferSize, MaxWriteBufferSize set to null, 0, max value #44239
  • [Analyzer] MinRequestBodyDataRate or MinResponseDataRate set to small value #44238
  • [Analyzer] Detect AllowSynchronousIO #44237
  • [Analyzer] Detect IHttpContextAccessor usage #44236

Closed

  • Don't source include JsonCpp in the SignalR-Cpp-Client #31010
    Backlog
  • Update the Razor / Roslyn version used by runtime compilation package #39387
    7.0.0
  • Add analyzers introduced in .NET 7 to docs page #44009
    7.0.0
  • Allow specifying host and port or port in ASPNETCORE_URLS #43135
    8.0-preview1
  • SPA running under IIS go to 503 but w3wp dont stop #44108
  • Fixer/Analyzer: Suggest rewriting builder.Host.ConfigureLogging to builder.Logging #35816
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [net7] Documentation updates for filters, OpenAPI, authentication #43145
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid occasional local build errors #44268
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix linking issues #44260
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update CODEOWNERS #44263
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Upgrade Microsoft.OpenApi dependency to 1.4.3 #44229
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update Roslyn Versions #44148
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • Read HTTP_PORTS and HTTPS_PORTS into IServerAddresses #44194
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages. #43937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Get template error codes from the right processes #44246
    area-mvc, tell-mode
  • Route tooling redux #44077
    8.0-preview1
  • Use perfect-hash in HttpUriScheme.GetKnownMethod(string) instead of trie #44096
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Retry a few tests #44235
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • Move to an 8.0.100-alpha SDK #44234
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Add support for minimal APIs in ApiDescription.Server #44227
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 6.0.11
  • [release/7.0] Move to an RTM SDK #44233
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr
  • Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #39140
    area-infrastructure
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc
  • Turn HTTP/3 on by default in Kestrel #44217
    area-runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44220
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/7.0] Remove VS nupkg push #44230
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2007508 #43956
    area-infrastructure
